english_translation: Narrated: Umar wrote to his governors: 'Do not leave any seal with Arabic script except that you break it.' A seal was found on Utbah ibn Farqad's seal, inscribed with 'Utbah the governor,' and it was broken. [Second chain] Umar saw Utbah ibn Farqad wearing a long-sleeved shirt, so he called for a blade to cut it from the tips of his fingers. Utbah said: 'O Commander of the Faithful, I am ashamed that you cut it; I will cut it myself,' so Umar left him alone.
